byline.original: By KARAM SHOUMALI and CEYLAN YEGINSU

abstract: Humanitarian group Syrian American Medical Society reports Islamic State group might have used chemical weapons during attack on Syrian city of Marea; rebel forces confirm group's report.
lead_paragraph: Local rebels and an international aid group accused the militant group of using mustard gas against civilian and rival insurgents in northern Syria last week.

headline.main: New Report of ISIS Using Poison Gas in Syria
headline.print_headline: New Report of Islamic State Using Poison Gas in Syria

snippet: Local rebels and an international aid group accused the militant group of using mustard gas against civilian and rival insurgents in northern Syria last week.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
